nodes.text: Denta beans were a food that was a major ingredient of denta bean buns. Captain Quarsh Panaka and his wife, Mariek Panaka, were interrupted by a security alert just as they were about to eat a dessert of denta bean buns, which the Theed Royal Palace kitchen had baked for the first day of the Summit on Naboo. Torro Sbazzle ordered her sous-chef, Gersolik, to make a drink from ten cans of roasted denta beans mixed with boiled whilk milk and thalassa seeds, which Sbazzle intended to serve Darth Vader.

According to author E. K. Johnston's tumblr, the first draft of Queen's Peril had Captain Panaka eating red bean buns instead of denta bean buns. However, the Lucasfilm Story Group asked if Johnston could make the meal "more Star Wars-y," leading her to use Wookieepedia to search for beans unique to Star Wars.
